page.title: 15BRANT BROUGHTON CAR FIRMS
page.content: There are two firms in Brant Broughton that specialise in refurbishing and supplying spare parts for prestige cars.Rimmer Brothers have been in business for 3 years and they have 5 permanent staff.They specialise in mail order spare parts for triumph sports cars,Dolomite and Stag.They sometimes send spare parts abroad and at the moment it is an expanding business.Princess services International and Classic Restorations are a joint concern formed 15 years ago,supplying spare parts and dashboard instruments for Rolls Royces,Bentleys and Vanden plas 1947-74.Many orders come in from abroad.Engines and spares have been provided for the Queen's fleet of cars.The instrument restorer works mainly on pre-war cars going back to 1912.Some parts are made by himself.
